notice.title: Notification

langMap.en_US: Dear users: We have supported Minecraft 1.1.0.9 to join Survival game,Team,Skywars,Build Batle and Clan War.Please update Blockman Multiplayer for MCPE to the latest version 4.10.6 in Google play.Thank you.
langMap.zh_CN: 亲爱的用户：我们已经支持Minecraft 1.1.0.9 加入饥饿游戏、组队、空岛战争、建造战争和部落战争。请在Google play更新Blockman Multiplayer for MCPE至最新版本4.10.6。谢谢。
langMap.zh_TW: 親愛的用戶：我們已經支持Minecraft 1.1.0.9 加入飢餓遊戲、組隊、空島戰爭、建造戰爭和部落戰爭。請在Google play更新Blockman Multiplayer for MCPE至最新版本4.10.6。謝謝。
langMap.ko_KR: 안녕하세요.마인크래프트 1.1.0.9가 서바이벌게임,Team,Skywars,Clan War에 참여할수 있게되였습니다. Blockman Multiplayer for MCPE 의 최신버전인4.10.6을 구글플레어에서 업데이트 해주시길 바랍니다. 감사합니다
langMap.ja_JP: We have supported Minecraft 1.1.0.9 to join Survival game,Team,Skywars,Build Batle and Clan War.Please update Blockman Multiplayer for MCPE to the latest version 4.10.6 in Google play.Thank you.
